events.message: Customer reported an auto collision involving their vehicle on Main Street during rush hour. Claim details were registered.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved a car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the customer’s case to guide through the process efficiently.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested repair estimates, police report, and photos of vehicle damage to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and mechanic’s repair estimate.
Claims team began thorough investigation to verify details of the car accident and assess liability.
Completed review of submitted evidence; confirmed collision details and assessed vehicle damage.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the repair costs and policy coverage limits to resolve the claim.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the quick handling and the proposed settlement.
Final approval was granted for the claim amount as per the agreed settlement terms.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer’s account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following successful payment issuance and customer confirmation.
